dcterms:creator: R. Amrit
J.B. Rawlings
D. Angeli
dcterms:description: A dataset used for economic optimization in model predictive control with a terminal cost, focusing on closed-loop stability and dissipativity.
dcterms:title: LQR case

dcterms:creator: S. Pirkelmann
D. Angeli
L. Grüne
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on the approximate computation of storage functions for discrete-time systems using sum-of-squares techniques, particularly in the context of non-polynomial dynamics.
dcterms:title: Non-polynomial case

dcterms:creator: S. Pirkelmann
D. Angeli
L. Grüne
dcterms:description: A dataset that illustrates non-dissipative dynamics and stage costs, demonstrating the absence of a valid storage function for certain dynamic systems.
dcterms:title: Non-dissipative dynamics
